name: The Adventures of Candyss
description:
Hello! This is a project I`ve been working on for the last few weeks using gamemaker. I am really sorry if it isn`t quite a polished game as i`ve just started doing gamemaker and stuff and plus i`m thirteen. I would love some constructive feedback and if people like it enough I will work on improving it! Thanks!

You can stick to walls by pressing the arrow pointing towards the desired wall and to move upwards you press the up arrow. You can also glide!! Z and X do something rather special; look out for easter eggs ;)

The last level is the black one. After you finish it, a white box will pop up with an error. Ignore that ;) 

From Andrei :)
